favourite.article: To God be the Glory! Thank You for this beautiful piece. I like it..
This song is written so beautifully. Lord, gain me more this year.
O Lord, amen.
Amen Lord!
We have to love the Lord!
One of the most beautifully written love songs for the Lord! Lord Jesus, You're truly my best love.
amen
Oh Lord Jesus I love You!!!
Amen..Jesus Lord is the best.
Jesus Lord Thou art our first love!
Ich leibe diese Lied, ich bin emmer verlieb zu unsere Gott, Herr Jesus ich liebe dich...
Precious hymn. To none else I cling, but Lord only Thee.
Jesus Lord my best love Thou art.
Wonderful hymn, so glad it was translated into English. Lord Jesus, I love You.
Such a sweet love song to my Lord.
Amen need more to be infused by this hymn so touching...
Sweet song...can't get enough of it.
What an amazing composition...I Love It!
Though my heart is oft not subdued, still Thy way alone it would choose.
Oh Lord Jesus!! Precious hymn! My heart is so happy!! You're our center and all!
Thank You Lord for such a precious hymn. Jesus Lord my best love You are. I confess all looseness, You are my only love.
Indeed, beautiful hymn to the Lord! It's so relaxing. I cannot control my emotion and feelings to the most affectionate one Christ Himself. PTL

What a beautiful hymn to The Lord! Every time I sing it I cannot help falling deeper in love with Him! This hymn is so refreshing to my spirit and helps me to give my entire being to Him whenever I sing it. "Jesus Lord my best love Thou art"! Oh there is truly no one else as lovely and charming as He! "Oh Lord Jesus how I love thee"! When we see His beauty, we realize that we are nothing & that He is everything! All that we wanted before Him is vanity & a waste of time. Only this precious One is worthy of all our time, being, & love. Oh may we even love Him back with His love that He has poured into us that His heart may be satisfied!

Life is a Person and there is no other way to apply and enjoy this Person but by love. We need to love Him. It is not enough to believe in the Lord Jesus. To believe is to receive, but to love is to enjoy what we have received. We must take His desires as our desires. We must take His will as our will. We must take His intention as our intention.To love Him as a Person, we must take His personality. We must learn to love the Lord faithfully! :)

I have heard lots of love songs and hymns - this ranked together with "Love with everlasting love," "All scenes alike engaging prove." Wonderful and marvellous - a true expression of the love of a believer unto our God!! Please also let me know who is the author and his/her testimony for this lovely song/hymn.
My self love lost in Thee...LORD JESUS YOU ARE MY BEST LOVE...
Very sweet hymn...:)

O, Lord Jesus, I praise You, that You're my best love. Make Yourself the Lord of my heart. Make nothing replace You in my heart. "Whom do I have in heaven but You? And there is none upon earth that I desires beside You". Lord, I love You! I do love You!

Mi Jesus, mi primer amor Sólo Tuyo es mi corazón, Nada se compara a Ti en verdad, Tan hermoso y bello Senor. Cuando escucho el susurrar De Tu hablar en mi corazón. Todo amor y búsqueda queda atrás, Mis jactancias, Qué vanas son!
Qué tan dulce en este universo es? Qué tan bello en la tierra como Tu? Eres digno Tu de todo mi amor, Muy profundo, Te amo Jesús. No seré igual, no me engañare, Ni atrapado en mi mundo estaré, Eres el mejor y único amor Tu amor profundo en mi ser.
Mi Jesús, mi mejor amor, Aunque es terco mi corazón, Hazme esclavo hoy de Tu gran amor Para amarte, yo Te deseo. Aunque aveces Te rechaze, Tu mirar siempre seguiré; Complacerte es mi mayor placer, Tu amor traspasa mi ser.
Mi Jesús, Te adoro Senor. No me apartaré más de Ti. Tu sonriente faz no se aleje de mi, Tu presencia deseo seguir. Hoy Te ofrezco mi corazon, Eres Tu mi satisfaccion; Mi porcion es Tu dulce ser poseer, Mi deseo único eres.

I love to sing this song. It refreshes my love to Him. "Lord capture my heart to love only You. You are my eternal portion. Nothing compares to You. You are my only love and my best love." I love You, Lord Jesus.
Oh Lord Jesus! Draw us near by Your love and we will run after You! I love this song, it opens my heart more for Him.
Incredible. I'm so glad I found this song.
Lord Jesus Christ, I love You.You're my only Love.
Deep within I know You're my only love, My best love is none else but You!
Every time I heard and sing this song, my love to the Lord is getting deeper, sweet and fresh. Lord Jesus my best love is none else but Thee! I love You Lord Jesus!
My gospel friend was saved after singing this song. Praise the Lord no one compares to You!
O Lord, I love You. No more I who live, no more self-deceived, No more in the self's world, vanity, indulged to be!
Oh Lord Jesus Christ You're my only love.

No more I who live, no more self-deceived, No more in the self's world indulged to be, Deep within I know You're my only love, My best love is none else but Thee!
Lord Jesus, make Your home more in our hearts so we may love You more and more each day!

Everytime I hear this hymn I can't stop the tears falling from my eyes. Tears of joy because I know that deep within the Lord is my only love. He is worthy of all my love. I just love Him! Lord, I just love You! Though I have many shortcomings and failures but what I know that deep within my heart, He's my only love.

The Lord should have our first love that is our best love. This hymn ushers every genuine believer, who will sing from their heart and spirit to the Lord, to give The Lord the rightful place in our heart and lives that is the first place and to gain our best love. May the Lord shine on us that we may get rid of every rock in our heart that hinders the Lord as the seed of life to grow in our heart to every part of our being. Lord Jesus draw us we will run after You!

No one compares with the Lord. We can be like Paul in Gal. 2:20 if we can enjoy the Lord, if we can taste His sweetness, at that time we can say that "no more I who live, no more self deceived." Amen.
This song really proves that if we will be with God we will also be saturated with the life-giving Spirit.
This song is so touching. When I attended the 2 weeks training I learned this song and I enjoyed very much the Lord.

I like very much and am touched with this song. I realize that even if we are all sinners but God still love us, God's love for us is eternal. We just need to praise and believe God. Amen!!! Oh my Lord, my best love is none else but Thee!! God's love is the basis of salvation!! Amen!

Oh my Lord, You're the only love I know, with my best love I love You so. I really love this song because it always reminds me of my consecration towards Him. His love never fades nor grown old. It becomes fresher and fresher its day.

Thank You Lord Jesus for Your great love!!! You are my strength, my light and life, my hope and love, my patience and my Healer, my reality and my enjoyment! Thank You Lord You dwell in me!!! You're my BEST LOVE! OH LORD JESUS!!!! Deep within I know You're my only love.
Lord Jesus! None compares with Thee, Thou alone so full of worth! So fair and sweet! To none else I'd cling, Lord, but Thee.

I like this song because it relates to my life. In my church life now here in the church in Iligan City, I am so happy that I have now CHRIST in my heart together with the brothers and sisters. PRAISE THE LORD!!! OH, LORD JESUS, I LOVE YOU WITH ALL MY HEART...
Who would compare to the Lord, who is lovely as He is. Lord we love You!
The Lord's love is so constraining! Though our "heart is oft not subdued", but "deep within" we "know He's our only love"!!!

"All past loves are gone Lord when You found me and when I found You...Deep within my heart I am just longing for You. Deep within You're my only love. People may not understand it but Lord I have seen Your beauty and none can compare to it. To behold Your face is my heart's desire. How Thy love my heart deeply fills...My eternal portion, most precious Lord...None but Thee I want evermore. I long for that day that I will see You face to face... Lord, I don't know another way apart from You."

We have installed this song at our blog Steps With A Conscious Contact. An exremely inspirational music and lyrics. Thank you so much for providing this service. In Jesus' pure and perfect love. Allan and Marisela McDougall
O Lord Jesus, thank You Lord for loving us first, Your great love really refresh me day by day. I love You, Lord.

We sang this song and memorized it on our trip with the Filipino saints from Vietnam to Cambodia to Thailand when we joined the international conference in Cambodia from Jan 26 to 28. It was a wonderful blending and this song was very much a part of it. May He be our BEST LOVE, TRUE LOVE, ONLY LOVE.
Lord, I really love You... You are my first and best love. You are doing all the things for us because You first love us.
As I listened to the music and read the words, my heart rejoiced at such timely words to me. Amen. He truly is the most precious One in us!
First Love, the Best Love only for my Lord Jesus.
I love this song. Thank God and I'll praise You, Lord.
Lord, I love You. Restore my first love to You, Lord.
This hymn constrains us to love Him even more and to be lost in Him. Lord, we give ourselves to You and for Your heart's desire. Amen!
I give my first love to You, Lord.
The Lord always have wonderful ways to gain us to love Him, live Him and serve Him. This hymn really supplies and strengthen me. We just love You Lord Jesus!
너무 좋아요. 데이비드 E 테일러 목사님의 책에서 보고 들어왔습니다. 정말 제가 찾던 천상의 멜로디 중의 하나예요.. 너무 감사합니다. ^^ I Love you Jesus, You're only my Lord!

Some love Him for what He has done, like Jonathan's love for David. Then there are those who have gone deeper with Him and love Him for who He is, like the Shulamite woman's love for King Solomon. Such is the spirit of this hymn. Thank you for this sweet love song to Jesus, our dear Savior and Lord; a refreshing drink for His seekers and Himself.

Oh yes Oh yes yes, I am in love with Lord Jesus Christ and what best way to be intimate with the One I love so much than through the melody of this hymn. Lord, I give my love to You for Your love You give abundantly with no limitations. All I yearn is what Thy Heart Desires. OH LORD, AMEN, HALLELUJAH!

This song is helping to recover the freshness of loving the Lord Jesus with our first and best love! I was deeply touched by the joining of such sweetness in the melody with the beauty of lyrics which reveal a heart opening to loving the Lord Jesus in an unreserved and pure way! praise the Lord!
Lord, I love You! What a love can compare to this! This song is so good. Thank You Lord for this song!
Wow!
How touching is this hymn!! We need to have it in Spanish! Wow!
So refreshing! What can I say but dear Lord Jesus, I give myself to You. No such love in the universe as this. Lord Jesus I love You as my best love.
When I first heard this song during the CAMANAVA Young People Conference, again I consecrated myself to Him that I would love Him more in a deep and rich way through His beauty.
